難: (nan/kata/muzuka) - difficult , difficulty, trouble, hardship; accident, disaster, danger; fault, defect; criticism
難い: (がたい) - (after the -masu stem of a verb)  difficult to ...; hard to ...
難がある: (なんがある) - to be a problem
難くない: (かたくない) - (as 〜に難くない) easy (to ...)
難しい: (muzukashii) - difficult, hard, troublesome, complicated, serious (doença, problema, etc.); fussy, particular, fastidious, hard to please, displeased , difficult, hard, troublesome, complicated, serious (disease, problem, etc.); fussy, particular, fastidious, hard to please, displeased; gloomy, glum, sullen, serious (look)
難しい病気: (むずかしいびょうき) - serious disease
難しい顔をする: (むずかしいかおをする) - to look displeased; to frown; to scowl; to look grave; to look serious

難ずる: (なんずる) - to criticize; to point out faults; to speak ill of
難に遭う: (なんにあう) - to meet with disaster
難中の難: (なんちゅうのなん) - the hardest thing of all
難事業: (なんじぎょう) - uphill task; difficult undertaking (project)
難件: (なんけん) - difficult matter or case
難問: (なんもん) - perplexity; difficult question; difficult problem
難問山積: (なんもんさんせき) - (yoji) mountain (pile) of difficult problems
難問題: (なんもんだい) - difficult problem or question
難所: (なんしょ) - perilous pass (on a route or journey); rough spot

難行苦行: (なんぎょうくぎょう) - (yoji) penance; hardship
